metadata.name: Omega NFT Horse Ticket
metadata.description:
A ticket to DeRace stables, exchangeable for Omega DeRace NFT horse once it is minted. 

DeRace NFT horses serve both as in-game assets and an independent liquid store of value. Horse owners can make a profit from horse breeding and racing in the DeRace NFT horse racing ecosystem. These NFT horses can also be traded in DeRaceâ€™s in-game marketplace, other NFT marketplaces or on any CEX, DEX or AMM.
